definition: lit. earthern pots make more noise than classical bells/good men are discarded in favor of bombastic ones (idiom)
pinyin: huang2 zhong1 hui3 qi4 wa3 fu3 lei2 ming2

definition: clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
variant of 毀|毁[hui3]/to defame/to slander
to abandon/to relinquish/to discard/to throw away
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]
to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)
